TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Stack Inline Light Patches (SILP) 1.0.1.0-release `<Space.Is.Dark.Bring More Light!!>` edition[01 Mar 23]

Articles.Content:
SIL Patches (SILP)

Adds Stack Inline Lights (SIL) to additional parts all with full color and brightness setup and in any sizes!

By zer0Kerbal and inspired by @alexustas

brought to you by KerbSimpleCo (KSC)

Adds Stack Inline Lights (SIL) to the additinal parts

  • SimpleCargo by Axial Aerospace
  • Most stock (round) docking ports
  • PicoPorts
  • Shield Pico Ports
  • KerbodynePlus
  • Making History

Cabin notes by zer0Kerbal

  • Please, leave your comments and suggestions. It is very important to me.
  • You can tweak values by editing the part.cfg or using a ModuleManager patch.

See more

Spoiler
  • ChangeLog for more details of changes
  • Discussions or KSP Forums for discussions and news
  • GitHub Pages
  • Known Issues for more details of feature requests and known issues

Help Wanted

Spoiler
  • Compatibility patches
  • Marketing Images and Videos such as hero shots, animated gifs, short highlights
  • Translations: See the README in the Localization folder for instructions for adding or improving translations. There is also the quickstart guide. GitHub push is the best way to contribute. Additions and corrections welcome!
  • Have a request? Glad to have them, kindly submit through GitHub.

Localization

  •  English
  • your translation here

Installation Directions 1

Use CurseForge/OverWolf Website/App

Dependencies

  • Kerbal Space Program  2
  • Stock Inline Lights (SIL)
  • Either 3
    • Module Manager /L
    • Module Manager

Supports

  • Most stock (round) docking ports
  • Shielded PicoPort (SPP)
  • Simple Cargo Solutions (CARGO)
  • PicoPort
  • KerbodynePlus
  • [Making History][KSP:website] Expansion
  • Bright Utilitarian Luminescent Beacon (BULB)

Suggests

  • Adjustable Mod Panel (KAMP)
  • Biomatic (BIO)
  • Docking Port Descriptions (DPD)
  • Drop Tank Wrapper (DROP)
  • Field Training Facility (FTF)
  • Field Training Lab (FTL)
  • GPO (Goo Pumps & Oils') Speed Pump (GPO)
  • Inflatable PicoPort (IPP)
  • Kaboom! (BOOM)
  • Keridian Dynamics (KDVA)
  • MoarKerbals (MOAR)
  • On Demand Fuel Cells (ODFC)
  • OScience Laboratories (OSL)
  • Papa Kerballini's Pizza (PIZZA)
  • Precise Maneuver (PM)
  • Pteron (MSRV)
  • SimpleConstruction! (SCON)
  • SimpleLogistics! (SLOG)
  • SimpleNotes! (NOTE)
  • Solar Science (SOL)
  • Stork Delivery System (SDS)
  • Transparent Pods (PODS)
  • TweakScale (twk)

The title and SpaceDock say Stock, the description and the other mod say Stack. Which is correct?

4 hours ago, HebaruSan said:

The title and SpaceDock say Stock, the description and the other mod say Stack. Which is correct?

thank you.

St A ck.

corrected here. checking elsewhere.

guess I have to delete/create a correct one on Spacedock.

Edited April 11, 2020 by zer0Kerbal

w00t - mod 2400! (Space dock delete/create to correct spelling done.)

thank you @HebaruSan

3 hours ago, ssd21345 said:

spaceduck link is broken

@zer0Kerbal ...thats because *someone* forgot to hit the "Publish" button, i bet...

 

Edited April 17, 2020 by Stone Blue
In 1.9.1 the outer light colour cannot be adjusted, but otherwise these work great. I hope this gets updated soon. Thanks for the mod.

2 hours ago, majNUN said:

In 1.9.1 the outer light colour cannot be adjusted, but otherwise these work great. I hope this gets updated soon. Thanks for the mod.

Interesting - is this in flight or just in editor?

I will be working on stepping up to the current version of KSP.

On 4/17/2020 at 9:02 AM, ssd21345 said:

spaceduck link is broken

+1

oops - that WAS the link - now it is 2400.... had to delete and recreate. Can change almost everything except the name - and it is Stack not Stock.

On 4/17/2020 at 12:45 PM, Stone Blue said:

@zer0Kerbal ...thats because *someone* forgot to hit the "Publish" button, i bet...

 

*chuckle*

2 hours ago, zer0Kerbal said:

Interesting - is this in flight or just in editor?

It's both.

1 minute ago, majNUN said:

It's both.

just in 1.9.x?

One of my old absolute faves, is it up on CKAN? Can't seem to find it.

On 3/3/2023 at 9:36 AM, RayneCloud said:

One of my old absolute faves, is it up on CKAN? Can't seem to find it.

Thank you @alexustas did a fantastic job with the initial mod @RayneCloud, and it is one of the addons I include in my own career game.

Both are available on CKAN; however for the latest releases of the myriad of my adds-ons - always download from CurseForge.

https://www.curseforge.com/kerbal/ksp-mods/stackinlinelights

https://www.curseforge.com/kerbal/ksp-mods/silpatches
